title: Stunning cinematic experience
review: A film that is both exceedingly dark but visually stunning, ultra stylish yet with an emotional undercurrent encapsulated in the marvelous Ellen Burstyn. Also a quite marvellous soundtrack featuring Clint Marshall / Kronos Quartet. One of the greatest films ever made. Go see.

title: Badly scripted, plodding, boring
review: And where did all the money go - two big cgi action scenes - where did the budget go?Minimal sets, unexplained plot points , endless meetings, cliched battle speeches, cliched dialogue, cliches cliches etc etcAlmost as bad as Attack of the Clones.Very underwhelming.
